attributes.review: I recently have stopped eating Cheetos as they upset my stomach. The first thing I see when I open this app is this big Cheeto boy. Disgusting! Brought back horrible memories.
attributes.title: Awful and gross

attributes.review: If I could leave a 0 star review, I WOULD. This app TRACKS your location and sends it to China, along with an insane amount of spam to your email. Horrible app. Terrible design.
